page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF SALLY
page.content: Enter the teacher,sits down beside her desk.Orders all around! Dinner money,notes.Silent reading,pages flicking,there is not a sound.Next comes maths!Brains are hatching,work improving,big red ticks across your book.Now comes playtime!It's all fun and run,and everyone's happiness comes out.Then we go in.Language jotters appear on the desk,Ideas and Skills are coming next. Brains are reappearing! Now it's the turn of dinner time. Yum,yum,yum,lots of fun.Club time begins once more.Passwords are whispered so no-one can hear.The leader checks no-one is near.When she decides the coast is clear,then the fun begins.After lunch we come back in,making an awful racket and din.Soon afterwards the bell for going home begins to ring.
